# Alta WMS

Enterprise Warehouse Management System - Modern, scalable WMS built with Next.js, NestJS, and PostgreSQL. Features real-time operations tracking, team management, Pantheon ERP integration, and comprehensive analytics.

## Topics

warehouse-management wms inventory-management logistics erp-integration nestjs nextjs typescript postgresql docker real-time team-management analytics warehouse-operations supply-chain

## About

Alta WMS is a comprehensive warehouse management solution designed for modern distribution centers and retail operations. It provides end-to-end visibility of warehouse operations with advanced features like real-time status tracking, team-based task assignment, and seamless ERP integration.

### Key Features
- Real-time operations tracking with live status updates
- Team-based task management with flexible completion policies
- Complete receiving and shipping workflows
- Pantheon ERP integration for automated document sync
- Interactive warehouse map with visual location management
- Mobile PWA for warehouse floor operations
- Advanced analytics and KPI dashboards
- Role-based access control with JWT authentication

### Tech Stack
- Backend: NestJS (Node.js) + PostgreSQL + TypeORM
- Frontend: Next.js (React) + TypeScript
- PWA: Service Workers + Offline Support
- Infrastructure: Docker + Nginx

### Quick Start
```bash
git clone https://github.com/Doppler617492/AltaWmsProject.git
cd AltaWmsProject
docker compose up --build
```

Visit http://localhost:3000 - Login: admin/admin
